Simulated buying of eDaler® The Buyer hereby agrees to simulate buying eDaler® to the amount of 31 SEK from its bank account SE5460000000000403333911 (IBAN format) via Handelsbanken.
Transaction fees There are no transaction fees during the simulation, as no real transaction will take place.

Service Provider The Neuron® will use the Open Payments Platform sandbox to perform a simulated direct bank transfer of the requested amount to the Neuron® operator. As soon as the transaction has been performed, the wallet of the Buyer will receive the corresponding amount of eDaler®.

Simulation The Buyer agrees to handle the generated eDaler® for an approved test only, and ensures the generated eDaler® is properly destroyed after the test is completed. The user also ensures the generated eDaler® is not used for other purposes than the approved testing. The eDaler® can be properly destroyed either by scanning an eDaler® destruction URI, or by simulating the sale of the corresponding amount via a similar sandbox service.
Test approval All tests of generated eDaler® in this simulation must be pre-approved by the operator of the Neuron® or the Trust Provider hosting the Neuron®.
